text: Castle Mountain () is in the Beartooth Mountains in the U.S. state of Montana, about ENE of Cooke City-Silver Gate. It is located in the Gallatin National Forest and Custer National Forest, just outside the northern boundary of Yellowstone National Park in the Absaroka-Beartooth Wilderness. The peak is the third tallest in the Beartooth Mountains, and the highest point in Carbon County, Montana. ==References== Castle Category:Beartooth Mountains Category:Mountains of Carbon County, Montana
title: Castle Mountain (Carbon County, Montana)
